incidents.name: UI error when toggling a flag from the legacy flag list

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

For users on the legacy UI only, toggling the flag on or off from the flag list is resulting in an error. Flags can still be toggled on or off from the individual flag view.

We have identified the problem and are working to resolve the issue.

incidents.name: Investigating - Service Interruption for some customers

incident_updates.body: The issue with flag payloads has been resolved. Impacted services have returned to normal operation.

Flag payloads are being delivered correctly. All known impacts have been remediated. We are continuing to monitor the health of impacted services and are working towards identifying the root cause. We will continue to update this page until the issue is fully resolved.
We have identified a mitigation strategy and remaining customer environments should be recovering. We are continuing to investigate the root cause of the issue.
A small number of customers are experiencing impacts to flag definition payloads delivered to their SDKs. We are investigating and will provide updates as they become available.
We are investigating a potential service interruption that may impact some customers. Please continue to monitor this page for updates.

affected_components.name: Feature management (non-core functionality) - Flag usage metrics

incident_updates.body:
We are investigating reports of incorrect "Last evaluated" timestamps and flags incorrectly reporting as "inactive". Flag evaluations data on the Flag Insights view is unaffected and showing correct data.

The flag delivery network and core feature management are both unaffected, so flags continue to be evaluated and updated without issue.

affected_components.name: Feature management (non-core functionality) - Flag usage metrics

components.name: Flag usage metrics
components.description: Recording and displaying of data pertaining to your flag usage
